content.text:
# Forward Club Agartala

}}
Forward Club Agartala is an Indian professional football club based in Agartala, in the Tripura State in northeast India. The club competes in the Chandra Memorial League. It is the current champion of the 2022 Chandra Memorial League.
Notable players
* Victor Amobi
* Christopher Chizoba
See also
* List of football clubs in India
